thread.section_title: Exclusive Offer Club Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exclusive Offer Club | exclusiveofferclub.com
thread.title: Preston
thread.title_full: Exclusive Offer Club reviewed by Preston

author: Preston
title: Preston
text: I was a little hesitant at first buying software from kijiji and worrying sending money to compete stranger, But, I'm glad to say this was a legit transaction and was easy to do. Bought the software and went on Adobe website to download and register the software under my account. Joe stuck by me every step of the way in installing and registering the software. Great service and happy with my purchase, couldn't thank you enough man. Now I have all the software and plus way more software to learn and use for my future design projects, thanks again man.
